Container.Name: LogicalDoc
Container.Overview: LogicalDOC Community Edition (AKA LogicalDOC CE) is an open-source document management software platform. By leveraging on the best-of-breed Java frameworks, it creates a flexible and powerful document management platform, which thanks to the most advanced presentation technology (Google GWT), is able to meet the needs of usability and more demanding management. LogicalDOC is both document management and collaboration system. The software is loaded with many functions and allows organizing, index, retrieving, controlling and distributing important business documents securely and safely for any organization and individual.

Config.Description: This houses the LogicalDoc document repository.

Config.Name: LogicalDoc Memory Allocation

Config.Description: The database type, possible vaues are: mysql(default), mssql, oracle, postgres

Config.Description: Must be true when using DB_URL (default is 'false')

Config.Name: LogicalDoc Database JDBC URL
Config.Description: The jdbc url to connect to the database (remember to set DB_MANUALURL to 'true')
